April 18 - 19 in Sunderland University, SU

ADVANCEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY IN HEALTHCARE CONFERENCE.

Virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) are providing new options to achieve preferred outcomes in several areas of treatment or therapy in healthcare,
OUR SERVICE
Health Care
To achieve success in health care in this modern era, a system well grounded in routine surveillance and medical intelligence as the backbone of the health sector
Check Up
By getting the correct health services, screenings, and treatment you are taking important steps toward living a longer, healthier life
Live Consultant
Need To Talk To A Health Professional Online? Arrange A Virtual Appointment 24/7. We Provide Wellbeing & Lifestyle Guidance To Help You Stay Healthy
ABOUT THE EVENT

Physicians already use VR for a variety of medical procedures, and VR telemedicine is becoming the new normal. AR helps create rich, interactive experiences that show how new drugs and medical devices interact with the body. The WEAR Healthcare Conference brings together the best minds in the Virtual & Augmented Reality ecosystem in the medical sector! Meet the top vendors and end-users who are leading in this space! In addition to presentations and demos, we will have the best-in-class online networking! We will have group networking, plus, a 1-on-1 networking area that will enable you to connect on video with all the Speakers & Sponsors and other executives attending, where you can preview each other's credentials and bio, and talk business! We expect 200-500+ executives from leading vendor

60 Participants
The consumerization of healthcare has transformed how health and wellness can be achieved for all individuals, especially elderly
8 Programs
Technological developments in healthcare are booming. Here are eigth programs that will open your mind wild. you dont want to miss it.
5 Speakers
Renowned physicians, and leaders in the medical community, we offer you speakers that provide answers and solutions to the ever changing face of healthcare
